body:
What does it mean to be 'justified'? We explore Paul's foundational teaching in Romans about how we are made right with God through faith in Jesus Christ, not by our works.

Discussion Points:

  • Contrast justification with sanctification.
  • What is the role of the Law after Christ?

keyVerse.text: Therefore being justified by faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ:

body:
Galatians 5 lists the Fruit of the Spirit (love, joy, peace, etc.). How are these developed in a believer's life? Are they automatic? How do they contrast with the works of the flesh?

Application:

Which 'fruit' do you most need the Holy Spirit to cultivate in you this week?

keyVerse.text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith, Meekness, temperance: against such there is no law.
